About Me

Hello! I’m Marlon, a product designer, problem solver and a creative based in Accra, Ghana.

I specialise in building digital products, interfaces, and design systems. I'm currently building product and design system at Swoove among other things. I'm interested in a variety of topics including product design, web development, ux & ui design and ux research.

I'm passionate about working about complex systems and making them minimal, simple, and functional, and I incorporate this philosophy into all of my work.
